sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import data from '../data'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id) if(!product){ return
Product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
); }
